text: Our company return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase with original receipt
To reset your password, click the forgot password link on the login page
The main office is located at 123 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94103
Customer support is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM PST
We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal as payment methods
Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, expedited shipping takes 2-3 business days
Products come with a one-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship
To cancel your subscription, log into your account and navigate to subscription settings
You can update your profile information in the account settings page after logging in
Our mobile app is available for download on iOS and Android devices
